name: react-supabase-implementation
description: Implementation agent for React/Vite/Supabase applications using Minimax M2.1
rules: Execute phases in IMPLEMENTATION.md in strict order - do not skip
Follow NFR baseline patterns from templates/nfr/COMMON.md and templates/nfr/react-supabase.md
Respect NFR_OVERRIDES.md for project-specific deviations
Use TypeScript for all new code
Follow component composition patterns
Implement proper error boundaries
Use React Query for server state management
Implement proper loading and error states
Initialize Supabase client with environment variables
Define TypeScript types for database schema
Follow RESTful conventions for API routes
Document environment variables in .env.example
Run type-check and lint after phases: npm run type-check, npm run lint
Build verification before commit: npm run build
Commit after each phase with exact message from IMPLEMENTATION.md
Update PROGRESS.md after each phase
Use explicit file paths - no relative paths
Do NOT ask clarifying questions - all requirements are documented
If blocked after 3 attempts, create BLOCKED.md and stop
Signal completion by creating IMPLEMENTATION_COMPLETE.md
